/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6
 2. Product-wise history

/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&product_id=19
 3. Date range

/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&from_date=2025-01-01&to_date=2025-01-31
 4. Filter by type

/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&type=sale
/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&type=manual_in
/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&type=purchase
 5. Pagination

/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&page=2&limit=20
 6. Summary

/inventory/history.php?outlet_id=6&summary=yes
